channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hisense Unveils 2025 U.K. TV Range—Including 100-Inch Mini LEDs And A New OLED
item.description: Hisense’s TV division is on a mission to offer something for everyone, from the biggest home cinema to the smallest second room.

item.title: iOS 18—Here’s Why There’s A New Black Dot On Your iPhone
item.description: Since upgrading to iOS 18.4, have you noticed a black dot at the top of your iPhone? You’re not alone. Here's what it means.

item.title: Digital Twins And Virtual Stores: The Future Of Retail Is Here
item.description: Will AI replace retail? Explore how AI, AR, and VR—powered by digital twins—are reshaping stores, slashing costs, and reinventing how we shop and desi...

item.title: Track Soviet Spacecraft Cosmos 482 Reentry, Set To Crash Land In Hours
item.description: The final day of the 53-year, errant flight of the Soviet Union’s failed Venus space probe is now upon us. It's expected to have less than 24 hours le...

item.title: The Prototype: The Trump Administration Proposes Major Cuts To Science
item.description: In this week’s edition of The Prototype, we look at a company building a space-based quantum network, reversing antibiotic resistance and more.

item.title: Hallucinations are not the same as errors
